level.text: Any individual, partnership, or corporation owning or operating a video arcade or an establishment in which mechanical amusement machines are offered for public use shall be required to obtain an annual license for the operation of the video arcade or mechanical amusement machine, and to pay the required license fee.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is the “Police Regulations of the District of Columbia/Video Arcades and Mechanical Amusement Machines Regulations Amendment Act of 1984,” D.C. Law 5-88, effective June 29, 1984.
